sequences.name: US Enterprise Tech - Revenue Leaders Outreach Sequence
sequences.objective: Start a conversation about improving real-time pipeline visibility and shortening stage handoffs for 200-500 rep teams

touches.objective: Introduce lack of real-time pipeline visibility across 200-500 reps
touches.subject_line: 30% better forecast accuracy for 200–500 rep teams
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, noticed {{company}} is scaling its sales org. Many revenue leaders with 200–500 reps struggle with real-time pipeline visibility, causing forecast misses. We export Asana deal data into Power BI/Tableau dashboards to give execs single-pane visibility — customers saw ~30% fewer forecast misses. Would a 10–15 minute call to compare dashboards make sense?
touches.hints: Reference headcount growth or recent sales org expansion

touches.objective: Share a case study on shortening handoffs that stall 8–12 month cycles
touches.subject_line: How a peer cut deal handoff delays by 25%
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, sharing a short case: a 300-rep SaaS team standardized deal handoffs in Asana and shortened stage durations in long 8–12 month cycles — their legal/product handoffs dropped 25%. Happy to send the two-slide summary?
touches.hints: Mention a well-known competitor or similar-sized company if available

touches.objective: Deep dive on ramp automation to reduce new rep time-to-productivity
touches.subject_line: Cut new rep ramp time with templated ramp plans
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, for teams expanding regions we’ve seen slow ramp leave territories undercovered. Using Asana Templates + AI Teammates to automate ramp plans reduced time-to-productivity for new reps by 20–30% at a 250-rep org. If ramp is a priority this quarter, I can share the ramp template we used.
touches.hints: If region expansion noted, call out the specific region (EMEA/APAC)

touches.objective: Directly request a short meeting to review pipeline dashboards and ramp playbooks
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, quick call request — 10 minutes to show how we wire Asana data into exec dashboards and a ramp playbook that cut new rep ramp by ~25%. When's best this week?
touches.hints: If calling, reference best times in prior email and provide two options

touches.objective: Provide social proof of forecast improvements using connectors
touches.subject_line: Exec dashboard example for multi-region forecasting
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, shared a one-page dashboard example that combines Asana + Tableau for multi-region forecasting — helps VPs avoid surprises at quarter close. Want the PDF?
touches.hints: Attach or offer a downloadable dashboard snapshot

touches.objective: Final value-first follow-up with a new angle on shortening stage durations
touches.subject_line: One ramp template and a legal handoff playbook
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, last note — wanted to share two assets that helped a 400-rep customer cut legal/product handoffs and speed close cycles: an Asana legal handoff playbook and a ramp template. Can I send them over?
touches.hints: Offer assets rather than asking for a meeting to lower friction

sequences.name: US Enterprise Financial Services - Ops Leaders Outreach Sequence
sequences.persona_name: US Enterprise Financial Services - Ops Leaders
sequences.objective: Engage ops leaders on creating audit-ready trails and automating approval routing across 100–300 distributors

touches.objective: Introduce missing audit trails across distributed workflows
touches.subject_line: Produce audit-ready trails for distributed workflows
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, I saw {{company}} manages complex distributor workflows. Many ops teams struggle to produce immutable audit trails across distributed processes — leading to compliance risk. Our Compliance Management captures project histories and exports audit-ready reports used by banks to pass external audits. Interested in seeing a sample export?
touches.hints: Reference any regulatory news or audits if public

touches.objective: Share an insight on automating manual approval routing that slows rollouts
touches.subject_line: Automating approvals cuts launch time ~30%
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, quick insight: one FS ops leader automated approval routing and compliance checks across 150 distributors, accelerating product launches ~30% with AI Workflows. Happy to share the routing rules we used.
touches.hints: If possible, reference a comparable financial product launch

touches.objective: Deep dive on reducing chargebacks and missed submissions via centralized task ownership
touches.subject_line: Reduce chargebacks from fragmented task ownership
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, fragmented task ownership often causes missed submissions and chargebacks. We centralize SLAs and ownership in Asana Work Management so teams have clear escalation paths — a client with 200 distributors cut submission errors by 40%. Can I send a 2‑page process map?
touches.hints: Offer a concrete metric or client name if allowed

touches.objective: Request a brief call to review compliance reporting and automated routing
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, quick call request — 15 minutes to walk through a compliance report export and an AI Workflow that routes approvals automatically. Would Tuesday or Thursday work?
touches.hints: Propose two short time slots in the next week

touches.objective: Follow up with a peer case study reducing operational costs from chargebacks
touches.subject_line: Case: 40% fewer submission errors at 200 distributors
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, sharing a short case study: a financial services ops team reduced chargebacks 40% after centralizing claim ownership in Asana. If you’d like, I can highlight the three SLAs they enforced.
touches.hints: Attach the one-page case study or offer it on request

sequences.name: California Mid-Market Marketing - Marketing VPs Outreach Sequence
sequences.objective: Get a meeting to show how Asana reduces creative handoff friction, saves contributor hours, and speeds campaign launches

touches.objective: Introduce missed campaign deadlines from disjointed creative handoffs
touches.subject_line: Stop missed campaign deadlines from handoff gaps
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, noticed {{company}} runs frequent multi-channel campaigns. Many mid-market marketing VPs miss client deadlines because creative handoffs are disjointed — hurting retention. Asana coordinates campaign tasks and deadlines across teams, improving on-time delivery for agencies and in-house teams. Want to see a campaign board we use?
touches.hints: Personalize with client sectors or campaign types (paid/social/OOH)

touches.objective: Share an insight on saving contributors time with AI brief drafting
touches.subject_line: Save 3–6 hrs/week with AI brief drafts
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, creative contributors often waste hours on briefs and updates. AI Teammates draft briefs and summarize status — saving contributors 3–6 hours/week at a similar SaaS marketing org. I can share sample briefs we generated.
touches.hints: If they’re agency-side, reference billable hours impact

touches.objective: Deep dive on using templates to cut repeated campaign setup times
touches.subject_line: Cut campaign setup time by ~50% with templates
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, repeated campaign setups slow launches. We provide Asana Templates that enforced naming, assets, and sign-offs — a mid-market team cut setup time ~50% and reduced launch errors. Can I send the template checklist we use for client launches?
touches.hints: Offer a concrete template/checklist tailored to their typical campaign type

touches.objective: Request a short demo to show AI brief and template examples
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, quick 10-minute demo to show an AI-drafted brief and the campaign template that shaved 50% setup time. Would Thursday morning or Friday afternoon work?
touches.hints: Reference time zones for California and offer two slots

touches.objective: Final follow-up offering a concrete asset (brief + template)
touches.subject_line: A sample brief + campaign template (no demo needed)
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, if you’re not ready for a call, I can send a sample AI-drafted brief and the campaign template we use — you can review them on your time. Want me to email them?
touches.hints: Lower friction by offering assets instead of a meeting

sequences.name: UK Public Sector - Program Delivery Leaders Outreach Sequence
sequences.persona_name: UK Public Sector - Program Delivery Leaders
sequences.objective: Open dialogue on delivering transparent audit trails, automating procurement sign-offs, and centralizing plans/budgets for multi-year programs

touches.objective: Introduce difficulty presenting transparent audit trails for multi-year programs
touches.subject_line: Deliver audit-ready trails for multi-year programs
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, public sector programs often stall because program leaders can’t present transparent audit trails for multi-year work. Our Compliance Management captures project controls and histories to produce audit-ready trails — one department reduced audit prep time by 40%. Interested in a short example?
touches.hints: Reference program names or funding rounds if public documents exist

touches.objective: Share insight on automating procurement and stakeholder sign-offs
touches.subject_line: Cut approval cycle times ~40% with automated sign-offs
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, procurement and stakeholder sign-offs often create bottlenecks. AI Workflows can automate routing and escalation rules — we saw a 40% cut in approval cycle time for a large program office. Can I send the routing playbook?
touches.hints: If you can, reference a relevant government framework or standard

touches.objective: Deep dive on centralizing plans, tasks, and budgets to reduce duplication
touches.subject_line: Single source of truth for plans & budgets
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, distributed delivery teams often lack a single source of truth — causing duplicated work and budget overruns. Asana Work Management centralizes plans, tasks, and budgets; one program office saved 18% of resource hours by removing duplicate tasks. Would you like the before/after process map?
touches.hints: Offer to map one of their programs as a pro bono exercise

touches.objective: Request a call to review compliance capture and approval automation
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, quick call to walk through the Compliance Management export and an AI Workflow that automates procurement sign-offs — 15 minutes next week? I can tailor the examples to your program scale.
touches.hints: Offer civil service-friendly times and be mindful of public sector procurement windows

touches.objective: Provide a peer case study on reduced procurement bottlenecks
touches.subject_line: Program office case: faster stakeholder sign-offs
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, following up with a short case study on a program office that automated sign-offs and reduced escalations — happy to share the escalation rules we used.
touches.hints: Attach a redacted case study or offer to send one privately

touches.objective: Final asset-forward follow-up offering process templates
touches.subject_line: Procurement routing template & audit export example
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, last note — I can send a procurement routing template and an audit export sample used by another UK program office. No meeting required — want the files?
touches.hints: Make it easy to say yes: one-click reply to request assets

sequences.name: Global Media & Entertainment - Creative Ops Leaders Outreach Sequence
sequences.persona_name: Global Media & Entertainment - Creative Ops Leaders
sequences.objective: Prompt a conversation about shortening multi-region approval loops, finding latest assets faster, and scaling repeatable production processes

touches.objective: Introduce long multi-region approval loops delaying releases
touches.subject_line: Shorten multi-region approval loops for timely releases
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, global media teams face long multi-region approval loops that delay releases and ad revenue. Asana standardizes review stages and owners so approvals move predictably — helping teams hit release windows across regions. Would you like a one-page approval flow we use?
touches.hints: Reference whether they operate in APAC, EMEA, and NA if known

touches.objective: Share an example on reducing time wasted locating latest assets and history
touches.subject_line: Cut asset search time with Figma/Drive integrations
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, creatives waste hours finding latest assets. We sync Figma and Drive versions into task histories so teams see the current master file — one studio cut asset search time by 60%. Want the integration checklist?
touches.hints: Mention file volume or typical asset types (spots, cutdowns, renders)

touches.objective: Deep dive on templates and AI workflows to scale repeatable production
touches.subject_line: Scale production with templates + AI workflows
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, scaling production often fails without repeatable processes. Asana Templates + AI Workflows create repeatable production frames, increasing throughput for campaigns and shows. I can share a production template that increased throughput by 25% at a multinational studio.
touches.hints: Offer a sample template based on show or campaign type

touches.objective: Request a brief call to show integrations and template examples
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, 10-minute call to show the Figma/Drive sync and a production template that boosted throughput. Would Wednesday or Friday work?
touches.hints: Offer times outside production crunch periods (e.g., avoid end-of-day deadlines)

touches.objective: Final follow-up with an asset offer (integration checklist + template)
touches.subject_line: Integration checklist + production template
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, if a call isn’t ideal, I can send the Figma/Drive integration checklist and a repeatable production template for your team to review. Want them?
touches.hints: Provide the assets as downloadable links to reduce back-and-forth

sequences.name: US Healthcare - Revenue Cycle Leaders Outreach Sequence
sequences.objective: Secure a conversation about reducing denial resolution times, centralizing claims tracking, and ensuring PHI-compliant audit trails

touches.objective: Introduce long denial resolution times impacting cash flow and DSOs
touches.subject_line: Reduce denial resolution time and improve cash flow
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, noticed {{company}} manages complex revenue cycles. Many revenue cycle leaders face long denial resolution times that hurt cash flow and increase DSOs. AI Workflows can automate denial routing and assignment, reducing resolution time by up to 30%. Can I share a one-page workflow?
touches.hints: If you know hospital size or patient volume, include it for context

touches.objective: Share an example on centralizing claims tracking to prevent missed deadlines
touches.subject_line: Centralize claims tracking to stop revenue leakage
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, manual claims tracking and follow-ups cause missed deadlines. Centralizing claim workflows and SLAs in Asana improved on-time filing and reduced revenue leakage for a mid-size health system. Want the SLA template we used?
touches.hints: Reference payer mix or common claim volumes if available

touches.objective: Deep dive on PHI compliance and audit trail controls
touches.subject_line: PHI-friendly audit trails for revenue cycle workflows
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, PHI-related compliance and audit trails can be heavy and error-prone. Our Compliance Management captures controlled audit trails for PHI workflows, simplifying audits and lowering regulatory risk. I can show an anonymized audit export used during an audit.
touches.hints: Avoid sharing any PHI; offer anonymized or redacted examples only

touches.objective: Request a short call to review denial workflow automation and audit exports
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, 15-minute call to walk through an AI Workflow that routes denials and a compliance export used in audits. Would Monday or Wednesday work?
touches.hints: Offer to coordinate with compliance/security stakeholders if needed

touches.objective: Provide a peer case study showing reduced DSOs after automation
touches.subject_line: Case: shorter DSOs after denial automation
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, sharing a brief case where denial automation reduced resolution time and improved cash flow — I can highlight the routing logic they used.
touches.hints: If possible, reference hospital type (acute/community) for relevance

touches.objective: Final asset-forward follow-up offering SLA templates and anonymized audit export
touches.subject_line: SLA template + anonymized audit export
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, last note — I can send the claims SLA template and an anonymized audit export for your team to review. No call required; want me to email them?
touches.hints: Emphasize PHI-safe, anonymized materials to reduce risk concerns
